title: Nvidia posts record $60 billion in revenue amid increased demand for AI, accelerated computing
description:
Nvidia reported increased demand for generative artificial intelligence (AI) and accelerated computing in its latest earnings report on Feb. 21. Jensen Huang, founder and CEO of Nvidia, said: “Accelerated computing and generative AI have hit the tipping point. Demand is surging worldwide across companies, industries and nations.” Huang added that Nvidia RTX has become a […]

The post Nvidia posts record $60 billion in revenue amid increased demand for AI, accelerated computing appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ethereum spot ETFs may intensify validator concentration risk, says S&P Global
description: S&P Global's report exposes the potential risks of concentrated staking power in Ethereum, exacerbated by the anticipated rise in ETF demand.
